Translations.Text: Muminagana! Tomadera dhana-sampada o santana-santati yena tomaderake allahara smarana theke gaphela na kare. Yara e karane gaphela haya, tara'i to ksatigrasta.

Ami tomaderake ya diyechi, ta theke mrtyu asara age'i byaya kara. An'yathaya se balabeh he amara palanakarta, amake ara'o kichukala abakasa dile na kena? Tahale ami sadaka karatama ebam satkarmidera antarbhukta hatama.
Pratyeka byaktira nirdharita samaya yakhana upasthita habe, takhana allaha ka'uke abakasa debena na. Tomara ya kara, allaha se bisaye khabara rakhena.
